attributes.title: READ👁👄👁!!
attributes.review: i ouviously got this app bc of our lovely orange puff cheeto president😏😍 and i was super exited to open it and see all the fun stuff you can do with it,as one should❤️🥵🥰 but as soon as i opened it, it felt like something i have never seen i felt like the devil it self was looking at me which was very scary and traumatizing it was the most horrendous thing ever it literally made my eyes bleed and i had to go to the hospital where i was later informed of my death😤😔 i recommend you guys that if you don’t wanna die pls don’t get this app it would literally kill you #thisappdeservesonestarbcitkilledme thank you donald poopy pants trump we love you👅😏🥰❤️🥵😍😘 but it’s all your fault so you deserve less than one star but i ouviously have to be generous to our lovely president and give him at least one star😡😡 also i’m so freaking tired of going into youtube and seeing one of your ads every five seconds(literally) so i would really appreciate if you took them off with love one of you’re fellow americans😘❤️💦🚨🧃🤚🏼have a great day everyone hopefully you found something wrong with this app just like me,, wish i was still here in earth but i will forever be haunted by donald j. poopy pants trump❤️💦

attributes.title: You did wrong bunkerboy 🤮🤮
attributes.review: I wanted to support our great president because he told me to download it so I did, as soon as I got the app and signed up I had to go take a big poop. When I was all done my dog was burned to death, then I checked on my other dog and she drowned!!! When I went back to my first dog the Cheeto man was eating my dog!!! 👹👿 Then he took all of my credit cards and wasted all my money on maga merch. Please help I’m in debt because of this orange orangutan.

attributes.title: Stinky Rat Banana Poop
attributes.review: This app is very bad. Because of this app is very bad, my storage is taken up by this app. No good, very bad, terrible, horrible. I download app for the 💕🌈✨AMAZING✨🌈💕 President in office who is 🌼racist✌️ 😗homophobic❤️ and definitely a 🤰pedo🧚‍♂️ to hear abt the campaign. This app totally stinks up my phone. It’s so bad. Horrible app. Allways sends messages that I don’t want. Very bad. No good at all. Horrible. Terrible. Hahahaha poop appp. Anyways this is a bad app.

attributes.title: To many glitches and nazis
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with the latest political news. The second I opened the app I was faced with the image of a HUGE nazi. This however was not the biggest issue with the app. Once in the app the amount of white supremacy was OVERWHELMING. The user interface was super glitchy and unfriendly. All the buttons were in the shape of swastikas this made learning to use the app quite difficult. The app was very obviously mining data. I Immediately began receiving adds for Trump related merchandise including but not limited to, Trump T-shirt’s, Trump mugs, Trump dog accessories, Space Force Dildos (in the shape of rockets), I ❤️ RUSSIA butt plugs, A whip that says “tough one Iran”, and last but not least a melt your own glacier children’s science kit. DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS HORRIFIC APP.

attributes.title: My house plants ✨❤️😭🧚🏻
attributes.review: I download this app in support of our wOnDeRfUl president 🇺🇸🇺🇸✨😭🧚🏻‍♀️. after I download this app it asked for my location, I pressed accept🧚🏻‍♀️✨😪. Right after, Mr.Cheeto appeared on my door step. I ran over to the door and opened it, he then ran inside my house😱😪😭.He continued to spray tanned all my house plants and stole my McDonald’s 😔✨😫.He then broke my window and ran away eating the McDonald’s ✨🧚🏻‍♀️😭🥺😤😢😥. Sadly the McDonald’s I got was for the stray cat I fed every day, without the McDonald’s he died 😭😭. This app ruined my already miserable day 😭🧚🏻‍♀️😔😢😭

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review:
So I got the app because I thought it got me a free spray tan or Cheeto puffs, BUT IT DOESN'T!!! It made me throw up everywhere and made me hate my self. It made my dog poop on my carpet and my roomba to smear it all over my $10000 white carpet. 
DONT GET THIS APP!!!  

PS-
women’s rights are human rights
Black live matter
Love is love 
No human is illegal 
All are welcome here 🧚🏿✨🧚🏾✨🧚🏽✨🧚🏼✨🧚🏻

attributes.title: Worse app EVER!!!!!
attributes.review: I (a gun loving, tractor running, conservative, straight white man) downloaded this app to support our president, Mr.Donald Trump. Now I never rate apps but this sticks out to me. I feel betrayed, lied to, beaten down, and screwed over. This app has lied to me multiple times, and has stolen my money 😡😡😡 I am furious!! My fellow republicans, fix this fake news!!
